The function names begin with “v,” followed by a mnemonic for the type of operation, e.g. “S” or “U” for signed or unsigned, then the width of the operation, then the name of the operation. For example, `vS8Divide` performs division of signed 8-bit values packed into 128-bit vectors.

# vBasicOps

**API Collection**

Perform basic arithmetic and logical functions on 128-bit vectors.

## Overview

vBasicOps.h declares a set of basic arithmetic and logical functions on 128-bit vectors, using the integer types from vecLibTypes.h.

The function names begin with “v,” followed by a mnemonic for the type of operation, e.g. “S” or “U” for signed or unsigned, then the width of the operation, then the name of the operation. For example, `vS8Divide` performs division of signed 8-bit values packed into 128-bit vectors.

## Shift and Rotate Functions (from vBasicOps.h)

- **vLL128Shift(_:_:)**: 128-bit logical left shift.
- **vLR128Shift(_:_:)**: 128-bit logical right shift.
- **vLL64Shift(_:_:)**: 64-bit logical left shift.
- **vLL64Shift2(_:_:)**: 64-bit logical left shift with two shift factors.
- **vLR64Shift(_:_:)**: 64-bit logical right shift.
- **vLR64Shift2(_:_:)**: 64-bit logical right shift with two shift factors.
- **vA64Shift(_:_:)**: 64-bit arithmetic (signed) shift.
- **vA64Shift2(_:_:)**: 64-bit arithmetic (signed) shift with two shift factors.
- **vA128Shift(_:_:)**: 128-bit arithmetic (signed) shift.
- **vL64Rotate(_:_:)**: 64-bit left rotate.
- **vR64Rotate(_:_:)**: 64-bit right rotate.
- **vL64Rotate2(_:_:)**: 64-bit left rotate with two rotation factors.
- **vR64Rotate2(_:_:)**: 64-bit right rotate with two rotation factors.
- **vL128Rotate(_:_:)**: 128-bit left rotate.
- **vR128Rotate(_:_:)**: 128-bit right rotate.

## Integer Arithmetic Functions (from vBasicOps.h)

- **vU64Add**: Unsigned 64-bit addition (modular arithmetic).
- **vU64AddS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vS64Add**: Signed 64-bit addition (modular arithmetic).
- **vS64AddS(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vU128Add(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit addition (modular arithmetic).
- **vU128AddS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vS128Add(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit addition (modular arithmetic).
- **vS128AddS(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit addition with saturation (clipping).
- **vU64Sub**: Unsigned 64-bit subtraction (modular arithmetic).
- **vU64SubS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vS64Sub**: Signed 64-bit subtraction (modular arithmetic).
- **vS64SubS(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vU128Sub(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit subtraction (modular arithmetic).
- **vU128SubS(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vS128Sub(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit subtraction (modular arithmetic).
- **vS128SubS(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit subtraction with saturation (clipping).
- **vU8HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Unsigned 8-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vS8HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Signed 8-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vU16HalfMultiply**: Unsigned 16-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vS16HalfMultiply**: Signed 16-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vU32HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Unsigned 32-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vS32HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Signed 32-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vU64HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vS64HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vU128HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vS128HalfMultiply(_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit multiplication; results are same width as multiplicands.
- **vU32FullMulEven(_:_:)**: Unsigned 32-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, even-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vU32FullMulOdd(_:_:)**: Unsigned 32-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, odd-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vS32FullMulEven(_:_:)**: Signed 32-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, even-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vS32FullMulOdd(_:_:)**: Signed 32-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, odd-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vU64FullMulEven(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, even-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vU64FullMulOdd(_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, odd-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vS64FullMulEven(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, even-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vS64FullMulOdd(_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit multiplication; results are twice as wide as multiplicands, odd-numbered elements of multiplicand vectors are used.  Note the big-endian convention: the leftmost element is element 0.
- **vU8Divide(_:_:_:)**: Unsigned 8-bit division.
- **vS8Divide(_:_:_:)**: Signed 8-bit division.
- **vU16Divide(_:_:_:)**: Unsigned 16-bit division.
- **vS16Divide(_:_:_:)**: Signed 16-bit division.
- **vU32Divide(_:_:_:)**: Unsigned 32-bit division.
- **vS32Divide(_:_:_:)**: Signed 32-bit division.
- **vU64Divide(_:_:_:)**: Unsigned 64-bit division.
- **vS64Divide(_:_:_:)**: Signed 64-bit division.
- **vU128Divide(_:_:_:)**: Unsigned 128-bit division.
- **vS128Divide(_:_:_:)**: Signed 128-bit division.
